sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_431105_cand_ass_question_library"> <x_431105_cand_ass_question_library action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <answers>Remind the developer of the importance of quality in the project and the significance to the business of achieving a high specification product. Ask them to try to find a way of managing their budget differently to enable the project to go ahead as planned
MOST EFFECTIVE LEAST EFFECTIVE Arrange a meeting between the lead developer and the business manager, explain the situation and ask them to work together to identify the best options for removing functionality
MOST EFFECTIVE LEAST EFFECTIVE ‘Ask the developer to make some recommendations for what could be stripped out without ‘compromising the performance of the remaining program and accept their suggestions.
MOST EFFECTIVE LEAST EFFECTIVE Use your role as project manager to negotiate an increased budget to enable to original specification to be delivered.
MOST EFFECTIVE LEAST EFFECTIVE</answers> <assessment_state display_value="Preselection CBT">5165ad5897442110a4deb9dfe153af6f</assessment_state> <correct_answer>Remind the developer of the importance of quality in the project and the significance to the business of achieving a high specification product. Ask them to try to find a way of managing their budget differently to enable the project to go ahead as planned
MOST EFFECTIVE LEAST EFFECTIVE</correct_answer> <default_max_value>11</default_max_value> <number>QLB0001016</number> <question>You are project managing the development and introduction an important new computer program. You are the interface between the IT team and the business whilst the program is being developed. The business has a very limited budget for the project. After five months work the lead developer tells you that they can only meet the agreed budget if some of the functionality is removed from the program.
Please consider the situation and then select which statement you feel is the most effective and the least effective response or action from the four statements.</question> <selection_criteria display_value="Situational Judgement (SJT)">d24e91d097442110a4deb9dfe153af4c</selection_criteria> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-12-24 14:56:18</sys_created_on> <sys_id>a1b07d9497842110a4deb9dfe153af44</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-12-25 06:44:32</sys_updated_on> </x_431105_cand_ass_question_library> </record_update>
